summary: Veterans who were exposed to Agent Orange in the Vietnam War era may be eligible for disability compensation. We examined how the Departments of Defense and Veterans Affairs communicated information to veterans and the public about possible Agent Orange exposure. Specifically, we looked at information about where Agent Orange had been tested, distributed, or stored in U.S. states and territories. We found that VA's website...
title: Agent Orange: Actions Needed to Improve Accuracy and Communication of Information on Testing and Storage Locations
